name: Ladybug
description: The future of WhatsApp bots now with plugin support.

HOST.description: Enter the number on which bot gonna run

PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: - , / , # , & etc. Put anything except @ (Default is .)

SESSION_ID.description: A random string for your bot session. Which works as an OTP to get qr code. You have to change session every time to get a new qr.

MODS.description: Put any phone number without + , () and spaces "," Ex:  917820953034,917083409908  )

TENOR_API_KEY.description: A key used for gif searches. If you don't have any, keep it default: AIzaSyCyouca1_KKy4W_MG1xsPzuku5oa8W358c

MONGODB.description: Put Your MongoDB URL. We will not provide any public MongoDB URL because of stability. You can create MongoDB Atlas URL for free.

PORT.description: The port on which your application runs

AUTHOR.description: The bot name for ladybug DB
